duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the maintenance of existing and development of new test methods for a variety of fiber optic products.
Modify/maintain existing test systems for legacy or new products.
Implement and support automated data collection for production test equipment.
Participate in New Product Development (NPD) team projects during appropriate phases of the project.
Aide in transitioning products from R&D into pilot.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a Technical Discipline (Master's preferred)
